title: How to Clean Billiard Balls

steps.headline: Acquire a bucket.
steps.description: A good few 3 or 4 gallons (11.4 or 15.1 L) will do.

steps.headline: Fill it with water.
steps.description: Fill bucket about 3/4s of the way up.

steps.headline: For every 10 parts water, put in 1 pack of detergent.
Soak the billiard balls for about 5 minutes.
Take each ball out of the bucket, and sprinkle a bit more detergent, and polish with a rag/towel.
Dry each ball with a dry towel.
